website_summaries.verdict: A practical choice for consumers who need a portable model that produces the best results. The top model in its category.
pros: Portable, efficient, and reliable when it comes to heating and cooling spaces up to 700 square feet
Features 3 speed settings and caster wheels
cons: On the heavy side, and the design is bulky

customer_reviews.title: Cools 500sq ft about 4F... in 3hrs
customer_reviews.text: So I either got a dud, or these things are practically useless. The air coming out of it is just cool, far from cold on an 85 degree day. Inside temperature is 81 degrees when the unit is running full blast. Update: Just determined by reading the manual that you need to remove the hose to dehumidify. So there’s no easy switching between modes. I specifically got it so I could cool (of course) but also switch quickly in the winter between dehumidify and heat. And, well, now I’m out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: SH22

customer_reviews.title: Good cooling system
customer_reviews.text: Good cooling system... It is noisy at Full power.. Does not have a timer that allows start / end setting. But will permit automatic timer if need to turn off after duration of time in service. Not clear about the water container and removal. The manual is very confusing on that account. High quality materials, and at this price point it is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome job cooling
customer_reviews.text: Great unit that I’ve had to use twice in my 5th because of issues with one of my main units. It cools the whole living room and kitchen with ease. Simple set up, 2 hose units are the way to go. I have yet to use the heater, but thee ac is flawless. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Pricy, but excelent AC
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but extremely effective. Cooled my hot office like a dream. I will likely never use the anything other than the air conditioner feature (e.g. the heater, dehumidifier or fan), so I might have wasted money on those, but as this was top-rated in Consumer Reports, I went with this model.
customer_reviews.author: Will T.

customer_reviews.title: Cools well and fairly quiet
customer_reviews.text: Newly purchased however works well so far. Cools well and is fairly quiet.There was some assembly and we had to set up a panel to block off the rest of the window (would've been nice if there was a kit included for this) however hopefully now we're ready for summer!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Not cooling as expected
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in the cooling of this unit. For 13,000 BTU s it doesn't cool last a single average size room. I Have a 6,000 HTH GE window AC that folks 3 rooms effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: We can sleep nicely through this terrific blow!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully fast delivery and easy set-up. As other reviews warned, THIS IS A LOUD MACHINE!!! It is, otherwise, AOK. I never had to deal with emptying the condensation, and it fit my window like a charm. The tubes are long and flexible enough for my cramped apartment's weird corners. It has a great variety of explicable settings and has made our summer nicely bearable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Donohue

customer_reviews.title: I GET TOO COOL AND MY GRANDDAUGHTER GETS TOO HOT
customer_reviews.text: I GET TOO COOL AND MY GRANDDAUGHTER GETS TOO HOT. I PUT THIS IN HER BEDROOM AND IT WORKS WELL TO KEEP HER ROOM COLD AND THE REST OF THE HOUSE JUST COOL. IT WORKS OUT WELL.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Hancock

customer_reviews.title: My previous single hose unit (different brand) was almost useless in the hot and humid Florida summers
customer_reviews.text: This unit is OUTSTANDING. My previous single hose unit (different brand) was almost useless in the hot and humid Florida summers. This winter has been very warm so far and this unit is keeping my office at the hangar very cool and warm on the few cool days we have had.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Brinckerhoff

customer_reviews.title: Not designed nor serviced in Southern California
customer_reviews.text: If you live in southern California do not buy this. I called the manufacturer and they reported their nearset service center is 55 miles away. I must take it to them that results in 200 miles of driving. Also, the exhaust panel is made for a sash window . Very few new homes have sash windows. I have sliding glass patio doors. The MFG'r sent me additional panels that I had to modify to get the vertical enclosure. The panels have air gaps that require card board to fill in. The return replacement warranty is 60 days. However AM=amazon did offer to refund the item and I can purchase anoterh item.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Greek

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received two of these and they were both badly damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie B.

customer_reviews.title: It cools/heats/dehumidifies very well, but the pump for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It cools/heats/dehumidifies very well, but the pump for the water well won't pump. Had to drive it 30mins to get it looked at so they would ship another one.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Locklear

customer_reviews.title: It was broken, made loud screeching noise, tech ...
customer_reviews.text: It was broken, made loud screeching noise, tech support from friedrich agreed but I am returning it to Amazon and waiting for a new new to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up, instant cooling
customer_reviews.text: this was the easiest unit to instal, and in minutes the effective cooling was felt. I would buy this unit again.
customer_reviews.author: anubispdx

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well but bugs can still get into the house and its expensive device​
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Does work!!! Cools room quickly. Wasn't hard to assemble or install. However, does need some fine tuning to fit into window. (Had to go to Home Depot and by window foam kit) Noisy. Hard to sleep with this on.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Very effective product. Quiet enough for a large bedroom ...
customer_reviews.text: Very effective product. Quiet enough for a large bedroom, you can roll it from room to room as you need it in areas where A/C is not always required or as a back up for an aging central system. Rolls into a closet when not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M Whitehill

customer_reviews.title: a sad disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: C.R.A.P.P.Y. No waayy is it 13,500 BTUs. I've just left my daughter's apartment, where a (still) Friedrich 12,000 BTU Kühl window unit has today been bought and installed. Within minutes the room was cool. This, au contraire, is just barely making a dent in the bedroom temperature. Absolutely correctly installed (and verified by today's a/c guys). It's a shame, because the idea was for her to be able to put it in and out each summer without having to get professionals/stronger people involved, and admittedly it's a very high ceilinged, top floor apartment, but it's really not up to the job - it's just not good. :(
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Massey

customer_reviews.title: it is difficult for the unit to cool spaces outside of that particular room
customer_reviews.text: Cools the space quickly but is noisy and large. If it is placed in a smaller room, it is difficult for the unit to cool spaces outside of that particular room.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Paul

customer_reviews.title: Get the Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Unit works as advertised but after 1year and 4 months condenser fan disinagrated found new at repairclinic.com took 4 days to receive and it is a much more plyable hop it hold out longer than original took about 2.5 hrs to fix
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F.

customer_reviews.title: Great med room A/C
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as advertised and really cooled the bedroom as hoped. We live in a small apt. and it also did a good job taking the edge off the extreme heat we exp. last Fall. It is a bit noisy but like city noise we got use to it. The exhaust hoses are not attractive but we hid them behind the curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia S.

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse!
customer_reviews.text: This unit delivers as a cooling unit in a big, but efficient way. Energy costs are low and the cooling for the appropriate space is excellent. The exhaust of moisture and auto drain feature works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Beaudry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because it's one of the only portables that had an EER rating. It is quiet in operation and cools my room (20 x 15) in no time at all. Only draw back is it only comes in white - would have liked a different color.
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cools very effectively
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this used and it arrived looking brand new. Works really well!!! Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They are for a customer and they seem to be very happy with the outcome of them.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Friedrich Portable Air Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This cools off our porch very well in the Florida heat! Very Easy to hook up and very well made. I would recommend this to anyone. We had a LG before and did not have variable fan speed or did it cool us down like this Friedrich!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This thing ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I tried and returned 3 other kinds before finding this one and it works great and does everything it says it does. I definitely recommend. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this unit for dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Dislike about unit, don’t buy this unit for dehumidifing, have not used for cooling yet. Purchased sept22,2018
customer_reviews.author: tim truog

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really cool off the room
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really cool off the room. I find that it only cools off the room at night. Should of just stuck with a window unit not a portable one.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great ac but not enough to cool 1200sf. Will buy an additional unit that will be sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M Hardy

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great!
customer_reviews.text: If you have the extra cash to get this thing do it. This things works great.
customer_reviews.author: mochadropmama

customer_reviews.title: better then expected
customer_reviews.text: it is better than expected. It has more btu than specified in discription. My central air broke and I use this to help cool living room and kiychen in florida.
customer_reviews.author: jac

customer_reviews.title: This indoor A/C rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 4 stars because I'm not impressed with the amount of heat it produces when in that mode. That said, the air conditioning part is the BEST! Once you figure out its thermostat is about 5 degrees above the real temperature in the room, it cools my 20' x 20' bedroom in less than 5 minutes. Waiting for the next electric bill, but I don't think this uses that many kilowatts. Actually, I really don't care - being cool in this add-on room is worth any price. Now if only the heater worked better...I'll stick to my present heater that does the job and is inexpensive to run.
customer_reviews.author: Great GrandmaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Now he can enjoy his space all summer
customer_reviews.text: Box was a little banged up, but the unit was unscratched. Bought as a gift for my husband. He Loves it. Living in Florida the garage was to hot to work in. Now he can enjoy his space all summer.
customer_reviews.author: E Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great portable heat pump
customer_reviews.text: I use mine in a 12x20 sunroom with a lot of glass and it works just fine. Of course you can't turn it on at 5:00pm on a 90 degree day and expect it to cool down to 74 in an hour. This unit is not loud! It is much more quite than my window ac/heater that it replaced and that unit had to be plugged in to a 240v outlet. I haven't used it long so I don't know about reliability, but I did buy the 3 year extended warranty that includes shipping both ways for repairs so I'm not that worried.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Simply love it!
customer_reviews.text: It cools/ warms up in no time super quick. Easy to use. Also use it to dehumidifier in my bathroom since my bedrooms bathroom don't have fan
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! The only thing it doesn't have is a removable condensation bucket. But for the Cooling and heating mode you don't need one. So you only need to hook up a hose for the dehumidifier. Works great cools my 750 sqft apt.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Grayman

customer_reviews.title: Dual Exhaust - the only way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Dual hose systems are the only way to go for a small condo and this is a very good unit. With a single hose system the exhausted hot air has to be replaced (you cannot create a vacuum) so air is sucked back into the room through every crack, and is usually hot outside air. My single-hose system, which had a similar BTU rating, couldn't cool the condo down more than a few degrees cooler than the outside temperature whereas this dual hose system actually maintains temperatures 20 degrees cooler than outside (outside was 95, inside was 72). I just wish it was quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Expensive & power hungry.
customer_reviews.text: Over $200.00 more than comparable unit. Tripped 15 amp breaker , uses more than rating label or online spec's state. Creates negative pressure even though dual hoses used. This is my 2nd unit as the 1st unit was damaged. Not well packaged for this heavy of a unit. I ended up buying a mini split unit.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is in our IT room and works great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well and cools the room from 80 to 72 in about 20 minutes
customer_reviews.author: geo

customer_reviews.title: The ac works well, but is very noisy, ...
customer_reviews.text: The ac works well, but is very noisy, we have it in an office but I don't know if I would want it in my home.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Broken from year one. It won't register past 76 ...
customer_reviews.text: Broken from year one. It won't register past 76 degrees. When I called customer service I was told I need to bring it to a store for repair, but it weighs too much for me to manage that, so this is money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Gallanda

customer_reviews.title: Best A/C ever.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, powerful. Easy to install. Would recommend to friends. A bit pricey compare to other brands. Overall I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad Zafranets

customer_reviews.title: High ceiling room
customer_reviews.text: It puts out cool air but our 225 sqft high ceiling room is a challenge
customer_reviews.author: billb

customer_reviews.title: Works well- hard to fit
customer_reviews.text: This appears to do everything I needed (after only a few days use) but..... beware that this has 5" duct work and finding the necessary fittings for a through wall installation was very difficult and ultimately required some home made adapters.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G. McMullin

customer_reviews.title: Dented unit
customer_reviews.text: My $650 air conditioner arrived dented, not in working order and I had to return it upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As well I think that is unacceptable for such a brand to sell such crap! Nevertheless
customer_reviews.text: The unit has been working 3-4 hours ONLY! The room temperature was UNCHANGED! The unit failed after another 2 hours, and now is out of order! I will send it back for refund. I think that for the amount I paid I could have bought 2 classical window units! As well I think that is unacceptable for such a brand to sell such crap! Nevertheless, instead of buying branded crap made in China, better go and buy straight the Chinese brands! At least you will never get over charged!
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was broken to pieces and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Billdfw

customer_reviews.title: 75 outside 87 inside
customer_reviews.text: This A/C unit exaust warped the cheap plastic window mount in 30 minutes. Did not seem that bad but more hot air is brought back in the room then cold air coming out of the unit. It was not designed for the extremes of So Cal. probably better in Anchorage or Sweden where outside temps don't soar in to the 80's.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN ZIMMER

customer_reviews.title: The AC unit works fine. The blower motor is noisy in all speed ...
customer_reviews.text: The 1 star review for this purchase is due to the lousy delivery service of UPS. The container that was delivered was all smashed-up. The delivery guy was rolling it on the pavement even after I advised him that there is an air conditioner inside. Obviously I refused the delivery. I made the same purchase with different vendor. The AC unit works fine. The blower motor is noisy in all speed setting but it delivers cold air so I don't mind the noise. I rate the performance of PH14B a 3.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: works but...
customer_reviews.text: we are returning it. It dehumidified the air so much - even on cool-only setting - that we could not be in the room with it running or afterwards. Our lips and the inside of our noses were cracking. It was very uncomfortable. But if we lived in a humid area this would be a no-brainer. It was attractive, easy to set up, and cooled the room.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had much higher hopes for this unit. Doesn't keep my 15'x27' room cool on warm days. I did everything exactly as the instructions and it barely makes a dent in the heat. I certain that a real window unit of similar power would do much better. Unfortunately we have casement windows and this was the only choice that fit. It might do more in a smaller room.
customer_reviews.author: Sam from Santa Monica

customer_reviews.title: It does not leak or drip water on the floor and it is easy to disconnect and roll away at the end of ...
customer_reviews.text: this machine has been a life saver. It works well and cools my entire downstairs. It does not leak or drip water on the floor and it is easy to disconnect and roll away at the end of the season. It is a little loud, but we put it in a room next to the living room and it cools both and doesn't disturb conversation or TV watching
customer_reviews.author: Kingali

customer_reviews.title: I may be sending this review too soon. Have ...
customer_reviews.text: I may be sending this review too soon. Have only had this unit for a couple of days, but it is doing what I wanted it to do when ordering it. After the season ends, and, if it is still performing as well, then the five stars is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Rating

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this unit for a couple months now and it has been working fine as an air conditioner. Haven't tried the heating option yet.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: AC and heat cycle work well.
customer_reviews.text: Heating and cooling modes work well but the dehumidify cycle is nearly useless. That cycle is simply the AC with a slow fan speed. The heat cycle works surprisingly well and dehumudifies.
customer_reviews.author: camper

customer_reviews.title: Meat Locker
customer_reviews.text: Do you dream of turning your bedroom into a meat locker - yea - it's that good. Your wife will probably hate you, but hey - you got your sleep right?
customer_reviews.author: David C. Griffin II

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy, a bit noisy but does get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: This unit is the best especially for us up here in Buffalo NY
customer_reviews.text: This unit is the best especially for us up here in Buffalo NY . I have a 1000 Sq ft home and it does the job perfectly. Especially if you don't want to pay for central air.
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: REALLY COOLS MY ROOM DOWN EVEN ON LOWEST FAN SETTING
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle halling

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy install
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy install. Timer fuction is weird since you don't set the time so how does it know when 12 actually is. But cools down a room in 20 min
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Southard

customer_reviews.title: very good unit, Had to go tru 3 of them ...
customer_reviews.text: very good unit, Had to go tru 3 of them because of fed-ex but the last one was a charm. 45 degree comes out the fan and no leaks, Pump takes the water right out the pump hose thru the window.
customer_reviews.author: James Harmon

customer_reviews.title: A Cool Summer
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment. Keeps my garage cooler during our hot, humid summers.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Bought USED from the Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time and well packed. I was very pleased that the cosmetic damage was not even noticeable. I spent and hour getting the unit unplugged and installed. When I turned the unit on in heat mode it sounded like marbles in a clothes dryer. I am returning the unit. It was obviously not tested in Heat Mode before it was sent out otherwise the noise would have been caught.
customer_reviews.author: Joe and Amber Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not bad! I'm using this in my 2-car garage and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad! I'm using this in my 2-car garage and I used a hole saw to drill inlet & exhaust holes in the side door. I installed the enclosed connection rings so I can properly feed the unit or cover those holes when not in use. It cools pretty well in the Florida heat. On the hottest days it can only keep the un-insulated garage in the mid-80's (but dehumidified!) but I don't think there are any 120v units that would do better. I have a in-line current meter and it pulls aroun 1280w when at full tilt. I suspect this unit might be even more effective in heat mode but I haven't verified it yet.
customer_reviews.author: TrevorLJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a little noisier than I expected, but cools my large room adequately.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY LAST PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: From the moment we turned this air conditioner on, it was gloriously cold in our 2 bedroom apartment. We have a 900 square foot apartment and placed the AC in our bedroom. We have a fan that blows the cold air out the bedroom door.. into the kitchen, and then one from the kitchen into the livingroom. This creates full air circulation. Our apartment is super comfortable this summer now. We hit 106 several times, and it has been nice to come home knowing it wouldn't be unbearable in our house. I really like that this AC has heat and dehumidifying properties. I'm looking forward to seeing what those functions can do once fall and winter hit in Oregon.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: 4 in 1 is 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! It does exactly what is says! The air conditioner worked great for us during a very hot Chicago summer. Now during the fall before our landlord turns on the heat, we use the heater function and I'm amazed at how amazing the room feels in a matter of minutes. I haven't tried the dehumidifier yet, but I'm sure it's just as good as everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Keita Jones

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The temperature gage on this thing does not work properly. Calling the manufacturer did not help. They told me to take this "portable" unit to a service store that handles these things. Do not buy one. The only reason I even gave it one star is because it does produce heat. Certainly not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fittery

customer_reviews.title: I have a 1250 square foot home and cant afford to replace my central air unit at the moment so I got this and am very happy with
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a reliable powerhouse! I have a 1250 square foot home and cant afford to replace my central air unit at the moment so I got this and am very happy with its performance. 1250 square feet is way more space than it is rated for but it does very well considering.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: The product was perfect. The only reason for return was my spouse had already purchased a very similar piece at a much lower price. I'm still waiting on my refund which is on a new card number because mine was comprised.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: My wallet is very happy how well this unit worked out
customer_reviews.text: It was either this, or front the cash for a new central air system. My wallet is very happy how well this unit worked out. 10 stars. Cools 1200 sqft quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: any funny cats here?

customer_reviews.title: What a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute piece of Junk. On a 90 degree day it can get one tiny room to 80 degrees. What a complete waste of money. Drained when first purchased with the automatic pump. Now it doesn't drain at all automatically. I have to take the valve off and tip it backwards almost laying it all the way flat to drain it. I have to hold it there for several minutes. This thing weighs at least 100 pounds or more. To call it "portable" is joke.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

product_meta.title: Friedrich ZoneAire PH14B Portable 4-In-One Air Conditioner/Heater/Dehumidifier/Fan with Reverse Cycle Heat Pump | 13,500 BTU, 115 Volt
product_meta.description: ZoneAire is like having multiple appliances in one convenient unit: an air conditioner, a dehumidifier, a fan and a heater (heat pump model only). It's practical and flexible: because the unit can move with you to any room, you get cooling exactly when and where you need it. The dehumidification mode keeps your space comfortably dry, and there's no bucket to empty. When you just want a gentle breeze, switch to fan mode. Remote control included. CFM 260cooling power:13500
feature_bullets: Auto restart: automatically restarts the motor in the event of a power failure or a power outage. Once the power is restored, the air conditioner will resume operation in the last Programmed setting
Easily portable: durable castor wheels and side handles make moving room-to-room easy. Cooling Amps: 10.8. Heating Amps: 10.8
3 fan speeds: find your ideal temperature by selecting 1 of 3 fan speeds
Air Circulation- 250 cubic feet per minute. Moisture Removal- 5 pints per hour
13500 Btu cooling and 10700 Btu heating ZoneAire portableheat pump has an EER of 9.5 for rooms up to approximately 700 sq ft.
Dual-hoses for closed loop cooling and exhaust functions for up to 40% faster cooling thean single hose units
4-in-1 system is an air conditioner, heater, dehumidifer and a fan
Condensate overflow protection will automatically shut off the unit if the tank should become full

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars157 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 1-year parts and labor, additional 4 years on sealed refrigeration system.
